# oi

Displays OI and call/put ratio for given stock - can add EXP date too for bigger breakdown

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/oi ticker [expiry]
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| ticker | Stock Ticker | False | None |
| expiry | Expiration Date | True | None |


---

## Examples

```
/oi AMC
```

```
/oi AMC 2022-07-29
```
---
